name: Keep my Google Doodle: First Day of Fall 2015
description: Permanently replace the logo on Google homepage by the “First Day of Fall 2015 (Southern Hemisphere)” Google Doodle.

user.name: The Cupcake Generator
user.about: Generating cupcakes and userstyles with love since 1673 ♥ Powered by busy critters and sleepy snails.

additional_info: UPDATES 2015/05/10 • Original release • Fixed sizing ratio (no more subtle vertical stretching) ADVICES This userstyle only apply on the regular desktop Google Search homepage, doesn't works with mobile version. Also doesn't replace the logo in the search results page header. CREDITS Google Doodle design & stop-motion animation by Kirsten Lepore: http://www.kirstenlepore.com/
